Posts.Content: I have a port, it was so much easier then getting stuck each time. I still have it 2 yrs after chemo and never had a problem with it, I'd get it removed byt they charge for that.
Posts.Title: pros and cons of pic lines or a port

Posts.Content: had it flushed for well over a year now, hasn't been a problem.
